modName: Realistic Skin And Hair Shaders - Giants
summary: Enables subsurface scattering for skin, realistic reflections for eyes, and anisotropic lighting on hair, on giants.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#f9cb9c]REALISTIC SKIN AND HAIR SHADERS - GIANTS
[/color]
[/size][size=3][heading][/size][color=#00ffff]Requirements[/color][size=3][/heading] [/size]

[size=2]None

[size=3][heading][/size][color=#00ffff]Changelog[/color][size=3][/heading] 

[/size][list]
[*]v1.1 - decreased SSS effect and specularity, fixed overblown highlights on eyes
[*]v1.00 - initial release
[/list][/size]

[size=3][heading][/size][color=cyan]Description[/color][size=3][/heading][/size]

[size=2]Enables subsurface scattering for skin, environment mapping and reflections to eyes, and anisotropic lighting + highlights for hair.  Giants look more real and alive.

Also replaces the vanilla 2D hair beads with new 3D meshes.

Giant Toes (the ingredient) have subsurface scattering added as well.[/size]

[size=3][heading][/size][color=cyan]Notes[/color][size=3][/heading][/size]

[list]
[*][size=2]Compatible with all texture replacers[/size]
[*][size=2]Not compatible with any mesh replacers[/size]
[/list]
author: powerofthree
